attributes.action: increase the amount of stages for short hops on a bus journey to a maximum of six stages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bus stops are barely 300 yards apart and the fact that a short hop, which costs £1.10, is limited to two stages, is a complete joke. most bus drivers will not bother if you pay short hop to go 5/6 stops but some bus drivers are reluctant i believe that the travel services must make enough money and it would barely affect them to make it officially 6 stages.
